com.truelayer.java.merchantaccounts

Interface IMerchantAccountsApi


  • public interface IMerchantAccountsApi
    Exposes all the merchant accounts related capabilities of the library.
    See Also:
    Merchant Accounts API reference

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • listMerchantAccounts

        @GET(value="/merchant-accounts")
java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ApiResponse<ListMerchantAccountsResponse>> listMerchantAccounts()
        List all your TrueLayer's merchant accounts. There might be more than one account per currency.
        Returns:
        the list of all you TrueLayer's merchant accounts
        See Also:
        List Merchant Accounts API reference

      • getMerchantAccountById

                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String merchantAccountId)
        Get the details of a single merchant account.
        Parameters:
        merchantAccountId - the id of the merchant account
        Returns:
        the details of the given merchant account
        See Also:
        Get Merchant Accounts API reference

      • getTransactions

        @GET(value="/merchant-accounts/{merchantAccountId}/transactions")
java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ApiResponse<GetTransactionsResponse>> getTransactions(@Path(value="merchantAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String merchantAccountId,
                                                                                                                                                               @Query(value="from")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String from,
                                                                                                                                                               @Query(value="to")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String to,
                                                                                                                                                               @Query(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                               TransactionTypeQuery type)
        Get the transactions of a single merchant account.
        Parameters:
        merchantAccountId - the id of the merchant account
        from - Timestamp as a string for the start of the range you are querying. Mandatory
        to - Timestamp as a string for the end of the range you are querying. Mandatory
        type - Filter transactions by type. If omitted, both payments and payouts will be returned.
        Returns:
        the list of transactions matching the specified filters
        See Also:
        Get Transactions API reference

      • updateSweeping

        @POST(value="/merchant-accounts/{merchantAccountId}/sweeping")
java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ApiResponse<SweepingSettings>> updateSweeping(@Path(value="merchantAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String merchantAccountId,
                                                                                                                                                    @Body
                                                                                                                                                    UpdateSweepingRequest updateSweepingRequest)
        Set the automatic sweeping settings for a merchant account. At regular intervals, any available balance in excess of the configured max_amount_in_minor is withdrawn to a pre-configured IBAN.
        Parameters:
        merchantAccountId - the id of the merchant account
        updateSweepingRequest - the update/setup sweeping request
        Returns:
        the updated sweeping settings
        See Also:
        Setup/Update Sweeping API reference

      • getSweepingSettings

        @GET(value="/merchant-accounts/{merchantAccountId}/sweeping")
java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ApiResponse<SweepingSettings>> getSweepingSettings(@Path(value="merchantAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String merchantAccountId)
        Get the automatic sweeping settings for a merchant account.
        Parameters:
        merchantAccountId - the id of the merchant account
        Returns:
        the sweeping settings for the given merchant account
        See Also:
        Get Sweeping Settings API reference

      • disableSweeping

        @DELETE(value="/merchant-accounts/{merchantAccountId}/sweeping")
java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ApiResponse<java.lang.Void>> disableSweeping(@Path(value="merchantAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String merchantAccountId)
        Disable automatic sweeping for a merchant account.
        Parameters:
        merchantAccountId - the id of the merchant account
        Returns:
        an empty response in case of success
        See Also:
        Disable Sweeping API reference
